title: Your stars today
text:
See what the stars have in store for you today.

FRIDAY OCTOBER 11, 2019

ARIES March 21-April 20 ***

There are many pressing tasks and responsibilities for you to handle today. But you’ll be no good to anyone if you’re worn-out. So put aside some special ‘me-time’ where you can relax and recharge.

TAURUS April 21-May 21 ***

You’ve got enormous dreams and creative schemes but don’t get too far ahead of yourself. If you promise too much – and then fail to deliver – then everyone will just end up disappointed.

GEMINI May 22-June 21 ***

The focus is firmly on your job or your public reputation. If a problem crops up then handle it in a calm, compassionate and sensitive way. It’s definitely not the time to indulge in gossip Gemini!

CANCER June 22-July 23 ***

When it comes to travel, education or your plans for the future, there are plenty of people with ideas about what you should be doing. Listen to what others have to say, and then make your own decision.

LEO July 24-Aug 23 ***

Mystery abounds and all is not as it appears today Lions. There is a lot happening beneath the surface and you’ll have to tune into your intuition to discover what’s really going on!

VIRGO Aug 24-Sep 23 **

A personal relationship or business partnership will leave you feeling somewhat confused today. Don’t assume you know what’s going on. Ask for clarification in a calm and sensitive way.

LIBRA Sep 24-Oct 23 ***

Don’t let someone talk you down. Be brave and believe in yourself. So your motto is from Libran birthday great, Eleanor Roosevelt. “No one can make you feel inferior without your consent.”

SCORPIO Oct 24-Nov 22 ***

Catching up with family members or close friends adds to an already frantic day for time-poor Scorpios. If someone needs your help, be as sensitive and compassionate as you possibly can.

SAGITTARIUS Nov 23-Dec 21 **

Avoid being too judgmental about a family matter. And beware thinking you have all the answers. There are many grey areas and you just don’t have all the relevant facts at the moment.

CAPRICORN Dec 22-Jan 20 ***

Relationships and connections within your local community look productive today, as you reach out and help someone in need. But strive to be extra patient with a confused family member.

AQUARIUS Jan 21-Feb 19 ***

You’re walking a fine line at the moment as you strive to get the balance right between having big bold dreams and actually putting them into practice. Stay on track and walk your talk.

PISCES Feb 20-March 20 ****

The Moon and Neptune link up in your sign today Pisces, which highlights emotional healing. It’s also the perfect time to express yourself in imaginative, creative and artistic ways.

YOUR DAY

Today’s stars encourage compassion, creativity and spirituality.

HAPPY BIRTHDAY

You are a charming person but resist the urge to be complacent. Home is where the heart is in 2020, as you re-connect with your nearest and dearest.

Copyright Joanne Madeline Moore 2019
description: See what the stars have in store for you today.
